author: pipermerriam
content: For those of you participating...  time to get your next development updates written and published...  what are you working on? any interesting problems? read anything worth sharing? write anything worth sharing?

author: potuz
content: I've been only benchmarking different hashing algorithms, adapted the bitcoind one to my project and looking into assembler after like 30 years, but it turns out that we can do much better than what we do now. Eventually I'll post results of those benchmarks when I decide what works best on my CPU
